name: Abomination
description: "Foolish rabble! You are beneath me!"

name: Absorbing Man
description: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an On Reveal, copy its text. (if able)

name: Adam Warlock
description: End of Turn: Draw a card if you're winning here. Otherwise, +1 Power.

name: Aero
description: On Reveal: The last card your opponent played moves to this location.

name: Agatha Harkness
description: Game Start: Draw Agatha. She controls your cards on even turns.

name: Agent 13
description: On Reveal: Add a random card to your hand.

name: Agent Coulson
description: On Reveal: Add a random 4-Cost and 0-Cost card to your hand.

name: America Chavez
description: On Reveal: Give the top card of your deck +3 Power.

name: Angela
description: After you play a card here, +1 Power.

name: Angel
description: When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your hand or deck to replace it.

name: Ant Man
description: Ongoing: If your side of this location is full, +4 Power.

name: Apocalypse
description: When you discard this, put it back with +4 Power.

name: Armor
description: Ongoing: Cards here can't be destroyed.

name: Arnim Zola
description: On Reveal: Destroy one of your other cards here to copy it at the other locations.

name: Attuma
description: End of Turn: Destroy one of your cards here with less Power.

name: Baron Mordo
description: On Reveal: The top card of your opponent's deck costs {card.AssignedCost} until turn 6.

name: Bast
description: On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your hand to 3.

name: Beast
description: On Reveal: Return your other cards here to your hand. They cost 1 less next turn.

name: Bishop
description: After you play a card, this gains +1 Power.

name: Black Bolt
description: On Reveal: Discard the card that costs the least from your opponent's hand.

description: End of Turn: Discard this from your hand.

description: On Reveal: Double this card's Power.

name: Blade

name: Blue Marvel
description: Ongoing: Your other cards have +1 Power.

name: Brood
description: On Reveal: Add 2 Broodlings here with the same Power.

name: Bucky Barnes
description: When this is destroyed, replace it with the {card.Card_Token.Name}.

name: Cable
description: On Reveal: Draw a card from your opponent's deck.

name: Captain America
description: Ongoing: Your other Ongoing cards here have +2 Power.

name: Captain Marvel
description:
At the end of the game, move to a location that wins you the
game. (If possible)

name: Colossus
description: Ongoing: Can't be destroyed, moved, or have its Power reduced.

name: Cosmo
description: Ongoing: On Reveal abilities won't happen here.

name: Crossbones

name: Crystal

name: Cyclops

On turn 5, you get to see your opponent's plays before you
make your own.
